## R packages

I am the main developer and maintainer of the following R packages:

- `r badger::badge_custom(x = "", y = "iCOBRA", color = "blue", url = "http://bioconductor.org/packages/iCOBRA/")` <img src="https://bioconductor.org/shields/years-in-bioc/iCOBRA.svg"> `r badger::badge_download_bioc(pkg = "iCOBRA")`
- `r badger::badge_custom(x = "", y = "compcodeR", color = "blue", url = "http://bioconductor.org/packages/compcodeR/")` <img src="https://bioconductor.org/shields/years-in-bioc/compcodeR.svg"> `r badger::badge_download_bioc(pkg = "compcodeR")`
- `r badger::badge_custom(x = "", y = "countsimQC", color = "blue", url = "http://bioconductor.org/packages/countsimQC/")` <img src="https://bioconductor.org/shields/years-in-bioc/countsimQC.svg"> `r badger::badge_download_bioc(pkg = "countsimQC")`

I have also contributed to these R packages:
